data.title: Cincinnati Children's offers more services at Centerville location
data.meta_description: Specialties include audiology, dermatology and eating disorders.
data.text:
CENTERVILLE, Ohio â Cincinnati Children's Hospital announced its Centerville location is offering more medical specialties.

Cincinnati Children's Centerville now has specialty care in:

Audiology

Dermatology

Eating disorders

Pulmonary medicine

NICU follow-up

Radiology (X-ray)

Allergy (starting in August)

The location, which opened in March of 2023, also offers care related to gastroenterology, neurology, urology, ENT (ear, nose and throat), pediatric surgery, preventive cardiology, weight conditions, ultrasound and laboratory.

Recently, there was a renovation for the building's interior, which doubled the size of patient care areas.

âCincinnati Childrenâs Centerville has received an enthusiastic response from patients and families who had not previously had easy access to the specialty care provided by the nationâs No. 1 pediatric health system,â said Carrie Romano, RN, a doctor of nursing practice who is vice president for Patient Services. âWe plan to see even more patients given the high demand for the medical specialties that we are adding at this Montgomery County location."

The site is located on 6555 Clyo Rd. and patients can schedule appointments online or by calling 937-610-1121.
